ygData.subject: Re: Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: I killed rahotep at level 14 it is a VERY rare spawn but is an easy kill. The sceptre looks cool but they have taken out its ability which is life drain,  the
ygData.messageBody:
I killed rahotep at level 14 it is a VERY rare spawn but is an easy kill.
The sceptre looks cool but they have taken out its ability which is life
drain, the sceptre is basically almost the same stat wise as a screaming
mace. Its rarity and look however make it an item that sells for quite a
lot.

Mr. J Daniels


On Mon, 28 Jun 1999 EqDungin@... wrote:

> From: EqDungin@...
>
> I agree completly. Unless your a Level 50th cleric youll never see the really
> good cleric weapons(scepter of rahotep, jewel encrusted sceptre) dont even
> know the stats on these, just seen the level 50's on my server with em. We
> need a mid range weapon, screaming mace just dont cut it,. If you are willing
> to branch out into 2hb however there are some awesome weapons such as the
> ogre war maul (but i dont have the patience) So lets all email verant about
> this! and ill post to eqvault message boards!
>
> Dungin Krawler
> Level 24th cleric - Rathe
